data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_efe9c7ed8d8f84f1bb0f88a3e08de5fc.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 120% of his Max HP and absorbs all incoming damage when it's active. When the Armor is destroyed, X.Borg will disengage from it and roll in the direction of the Joystick (he is immune to damage during this process). The Armor's energy will gradually regenerate while X.Borg is in the Armorless State. At full energy, X.Borg re-equips the Armor and restores it to 30% of his Max HP.

X.Borg's fire damage causes enemies to heat up. Enemies at maximum temperature will drop Firaga supplies when they take fire damage from X.Borg. Picking up a Firaga supply restores 10% of the Armor's HP, or 10 energy while in the Armorless State.

X.Borg sprays fire in the target direction, dealing 25<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> 7 times over 2s to enemies in range (only deals 75% damage against Minions). Enemies at maximum temperature are dealt <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> instead.

<font color="a6aafb">Armorless</font> State: The attack area becomes narrower but longer, while the damage is reduced to 60% of that in <font color="a6aafb">Armored</font> state.

X.Borg shoots 5 Fire Stakes at the edge of the fan-shaped indicator and retrieves them after 1.7s, each dealing 50<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and pulling the enemies in the path toward him. Firaga Supplies in the path will also be retrieved if touched by Fire Stakes.

<font color="a6aafb">Armorless</font> State: X.Borg adjusts Fire Stake Launcher to increase its range and shorten the distance between Fire Stakes.

X.Borg charges in the target direction while rotating and spraying fire, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+130% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> 7 times and slowing enemies hit by 25%. He stops upon running into an enemy hero and will slow them by an additional 40%. After 3s from the start of the skill, X.Borg's <font color="a6aafb">Firaga Armor</font> will detonate, dealing <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to nearby enemies equal to 300 plus 15% of their Max HP. If the Armor is destroyed before it can self-detonate, it will only deal 50% of the damage. When his Armor detonates, X.Borg will dash a short distance in the Joystick's direction and enter the <font color="a6aafb">Armorless</font> state while removing all debuffs from himself.

This skill cannot be used in the <font color="a6aafb">Armorless</font> state.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: X.Borg stops spraying fire and immediately detonates his <font color="a6aafb">Firaga Armor</font>.

data.name: X.Borg

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Mixed build. Hard to kill, and good at constantly poking at enemies.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Marbon
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: An uncontrollable flame that's determined to take revenge against Eruditio.

assist.desc: X.Borg pairs well with heroes who excel in burst damage, such as Karina and Martis. X.Borg's AOE damage will leave enemies low enough for his teammate to finishing off.

strong.desc: X.Borg counters Fighters that lack mobility, such as Terizla and Aulus. His 1st Skill has a large range and can be cast while moving, making it easy for him to kite.

weak.desc: X.Borg is countered by Fighters with burst damage like Martis and Dyrroth. They can quickly burst down X.Borg when he is Armorless.
